text: Julius Deion Randle (born November 29, 1994) is an American basketball player for the Minnesota Timberwolves. He played for the Los Angeles Lakers in 2015. He attended University of Kentucky and played for the Wildcats for one year. He currently plays for the New York Knicks at power forward/center positions. title: Julius Randle
